LanguageData.FBF.EmancipatedJoinedDesc: {WARDEN_nameDef} has freed {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't have anywhere else to go, and decides to join your colony.
LanguageData.FBF.FreedBySlaverLeftColonyDesc: {WARDEN_nameDef} has freed {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} cannot believe {PAWN_possessive} luck and makes a run for freedom.
LanguageData.FBF.ClearSlaveLaborAreaDesc: Remove zone using selected terrian where your slaves will be able to work.
LanguageData.FBF.ExpandSlaveLaborAreaDesc: Create a zone, using selected terrian, where your slaves will be able to work.
LanguageData.FBF.SlaveDamagedCollar: {PAWN_nameDef} has damaged {PAWN_possessive} collar in an escape attempt!
